description: [Wave](http://incubator.apache.org/wave/) is a distributed, near-real-time, rich collaboration platform that allows users to work together in new and exciting ways. Wave allows for flexible modes of communication, blending chat, email and collaborative document editing in to one seamless environment.
name: Wave / Apache Wave

ohloh.description: Wave is a rich, distributed, near-real-time collaboration platform, which allows users to work together in new and exciting ways. The main sub project of Apache Wave is "Wave in a Box", a stand alone wave server and rich web client that can serve as a Wave reference implementation. As the project grows we hope to expand to offer other Wave related goodies as well.
ohloh.name: Apache Wave (Incubating)
